com.justinkleiber.motor.controllers

Class FocusGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justinkleiber.motor.controllers.MotorGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graphics

    public class FocusGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graphics
    Manages the drawing of all graphics to a canvas
    Author:
    Justin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Animate a Dynamic Rotation SpriteSheet Row (origin point is at the center of Sprite for best rotation results) with a delay

      Another way to animate a SpriteSheet row with a delay

      Animates a Static Rotation SpriteSheet row with a delay, assuming Position is defined

      Animate a Dynamic Rotation SpriteSheet Row (origin point is at the center of Sprite for best rotation results) with a delay This assumes Position is already defined

      • animateSheetRow

        public void animateSheetRow(SpriteSheet ss,
                            float x,
                            float y,
                            int row,
                            int delay,
                            int delayIndex,
                            float angle)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Another way to animate a SpriteSheet row with a delay
        Specified by:
        animateSheetRow in interface Graphics
        Parameters:
        ss - SpriteSheet
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate
        row - Row to animate
        delay - the amount of frames to wait
        delayIndex - the index to store the certain delay amount in
        angle - Rotation angle

      • animateSheetByIndex

        public void animateSheetByIndex(SpriteSheet ss,
                                int start,
                                int end,
                                int delay,
                                boolean startbool,
                                float angle)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Animates a SpriteSheet from one index to another without regard for rows or columns. Index 0 is the top left of the SpriteSheet and increments to the right. New lines do not affect index
        Specified by:
        animateSheetByIndex in interface Graphics
        Parameters:
        ss - SpriteSheet
        start - The index to start at
        end - The index to end at
        delay - The amount of loops to wait between frames
        startbool - Restarts the sequence if true
        angle - Angle of Rotation

                                            int row,
                                            int col,
                                            int cx,
                                            int cy,
                                            int x,
                                            int y,
                                            float pace,
                                            float angle)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Animates a Dynamic Rotation SpriteSheet to a point
        Specified by:
        animateSpriteSheetToCoordinates in interface Graphics
        Parameters:
        s - SpriteSheet
        row - the row of the Sprite
        col - The column of the Sprite
        cx - The current X coord
        cy - The current Y coord
        x - The desired x coord
        y - The desired y coord
        pace - The speed (Proportional Control)
        angle - Rotation angle
